June 14, 1947 D Hinckley Contest (Second Section)
Hinckley Contest (Second Section) 0 Test Piece Contest
hinckley-contest-second-section
None
Recollections of Mendelssohn
Hinckley, Leicestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £20 and trophy, 2nd £15, 3rd £10, 4th £5. Highest placed Leicester Association Band - Snibston. Highest Section 3 band - Kibworth. Gainsborough Britannia placed 1st but disqualified for breach of rules. 18 bands competed
Feb. 7, 2013, 11:31 p.m. Feb. 13, 2019, 1:01 p.m.
1 Markham Main Colliery Band Edwin Griffiths
2 William Davis Construction Group Band G. Shillian
3 Nuneaton Borough J. Locker
4 Hade Edge George Hespe
Unknown Result Kibworth Band Unknown
Disqualified Gainsborough Britannia Works Band Unknown
